e. Laboratory Investigations
Lab investigations that will need to be undertaken at the level of HWC-SHCs for ANC assessment are as follows:
a. Pregnancy Detection Test (refer section 2.1)
b. Haemoglobin Test (See Annexure 5)
c. Complete Urine Analysis â€“ urine test for albumin and sugar (see Annexure 6)
d. Blood sugar testing 
e. Testing for Malaria if the woman complains of fever with chills (See Annexure 9)
f. HIV (Antibodies to HIV 1 and 2)
g. RDT for HBsAg
